name: discord-ai-bot
description: A Discord bot that listens to chat and responds with AI messages using a local model.

scripts.start: npm run olloma:pull && concurrently -k -n OLLAMA,BOT "npm run olloma:serve" "npm run wait:ollama && npm run bot:start"
scripts.bot:only: npm run olloma:pull && npm run wait:olloma && npm run bot:start

author: Lou Philips
